hints: The hour 2:00 PM is not the Whipped Cream topping
Either the flavor Vanilla or the hour 2:00 PM is the topping Whipped Cream
The flavor Mint is the hour 3:00 PM
The topping Hot Fudge is 2 hours before the flavor Mint
Either The topping Sprinkles is the flavor Chocolate or The hour 4:00 PM is the flavor Mint
Either the topping Sprinkles or the topping Cookies is the hour 2:00 PM
The hour 1:00 PM is not the Vanilla flavor
